SuccessRegistered: Log in for the first time and have automatically registered for you.
LogFormat: User {0} is automatically registered, the password is {1}.
NonCharsWarning: Random password characters must contain at least one of the Digits, LowerLetters, UpperLetters.
PasswordLengthTooShortWarning: The random password length must not be less than TShock specified minimum password length.
UnavailableCharacterWarning: Role names can only use letters and digits.
